<<<<<<< HEAD
The vvandering-Jew, telling fortunes to English-men Gad ben-Arod, ben-Balaam, ben-Ahimoth, ben-Baal, ben-Gog, ben-Magog.
[6], 67, [1] p.
Printed by Iohn Raworth, for Nathaniel Butter, London : 1640.
Preface signed: Gad ben-Arod, ben-Balaam, ben-Ahimoth, ben-Baal, ben-Gog, ben-Magog (a pseudonym). Title page woodcut. Running title reads: The wandring Jew. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The vvandering-Jew, telling fortunes to English-men Gad ben-Arod, ben-Balaam, ben-Ahimoth, ben-Baal, ben-Gog, ben-Magog.
[6], 67, [1] p.
Printed by Iohn Raworth, for Nathaniel Butter, London : 1640.
Preface signed: Gad ben-Arod, ben-Balaam, ben-Ahimoth, ben-Baal, ben-Gog, ben-Magog (a pseudonym). Title page woodcut. Running title reads: The wandring Jew. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Nathaniel Butter
Iohn Raworth
